ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:23:46 [Issue ID 4000-204227] urn:comicvine:4000-204227 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 17:45:55. [Issue ID 369719]
ComicInfo.Summary: Lights...Camera... Action! The cameras are rolling for the auditions of a new made-for-TV superhero team: WildGuard. Hundreds of superheroes will try out, but only five will have what it takes to make the team... if they survive! Join a host of heroes, through the agony of competition and unforeseen dangers, as they hope to be selected by a panel of judges, including the mysterious Producer "X". Who will make the cut? You make the call! Log on to www.wildguard.com and cast your vote for the hero you want to make the team. Written and drawn by Todd Nauck, the artist of popular DC Comics series, Young Justice. The auditions have been invaded! It's an all-out slugfest when the WildGuard hopefuls go toe-to-toe with unknown assailants. The number of contenders is drastically cut from hundreds to two dozen as the auditions continue during this battle royale. Tune in and find out who makes it past "Round One"! Will your favorites make the cut? Don't miss your chance to be a part of the creation of this brand new super team!
ComicInfo.Title: Part Two: Five Hundred for Fighting
